ğŸ”” Save to Google Keep in a single click! Capture screenshot. AI summary

ğŸ“¢ Top Features
âœª No Signup or permission required
âœª Open Keep notes in side Panel
âœª Save selected text, images and urls
âœª  Capture and insert screenshot
âœª Clip article and multi select text
âœª Al summary, Mindmap and Highlight powered by ChatGPT
âœª Automatically saves to Google Keep
âœª Insert text & images by drag & drop
âœª Insert text by ctrl+C 
âœª Insert text & images by right-click menu
âœª Upload webp/avif/heic/tiff image on keep
âœª  Embed PDF file in google keep note 
âœª Persistent Text Highlighter
âœª Lightweight 50KB only
âœª no tracking, no Ads
âœª Dark mode

âŒ¨ï¸ keyboard shortcuts
keyboard shortcuts 
Alt + K â‡’ Open keepClipper sidePanel
Alt + S â‡’ Capture Screenshot
Alt + M â‡’ Multi select text
Esc â‡’ Close note editor popup
Ctrl+Z â‡’ undo (work only when copy listener on)
Ctrl+Y â‡’ redo (work only when copy listener on)
Alt + H â‡’ highlight (work only when copy listener on)
Ctrl+ Shift + H â‡’ remove highlight 
Ctrl+ Shift + Z â‡’ undo highlight 
Ctrl+ Shift + Y â‡’ redo highlight 
Shift + Space â‡’ extend selection (work only when copy listener on)

â„¹ï¸  How to use keepClipper
Pin keepClipper after install extension
Click on keepClipper or (Alt + K ) to open keepClipper side Panel
Drag text & images and drop into notes

âœï¸ Append text
1. Select text and hover over *clip to keep* from right click menu then select notes
2. Open keepClipper side panel. Open note editor dialog.
selected text will auto-copied to  keepCliper when you press ctrl+c on any webpage
Ctrl+Z for undo
Ctrl+Y for redo
Shift + Space for extend selection
Alt+H for highlight text (work only when copy listener on)
3. Drag text and drop on note

âœ… Clip article in one click
If you want summarize current webpage or create mindmap then change clip content type.
 keyboard shortcut: Alt + A (works when popup window open)
Clip article from current tab or all open tabs in one click.
you can add frontmatter and download articles' images into "images" folder.

âœ… AI Summary, Mindmap and Highlight

â˜› Note:
If you want to clip text contents in markdown format, you need to enable markdown format option on extension's options page

ğŸ–¥ï¸ Take screenshot
Click on screenshot icon for capture and save screenshot.
Select note where you want to insert screenshot.
keepClipper capture selected area and upload screenshot on google keep
Use Keyboard shortcut (Alt + S)

ğŸ–ï¸ Highlight text
When you clip selected text, selected text will highlighted automatically
Click on Save Highlight button on right bottom corner to save highlight.
For remove highlight, Select again highlighted text and press Ctrl + Shift + H.
For disable highlight, Go to options page

âœ… Clip text, linkUrls and images by right click menu
Right click on selected content then hover over "clip to keep" option
Select note from sub-menu list and selected content will insert into keep

â‡’ FIXED: Can't summarize webpage when chatGPT logged in
â‡’ FIXED: Cross-origin image clip

ğŸš€ Version 0.1.11
â‡’ FIXED: keep asking account not login
â‡’ FIXED: Failed to fetch all existing notes
â‡’ FIXED: Cannot capture screenshot
â‡’ FIXED: Insert screenshot in new note create list note

ğŸš€ Version 0.1.10
â‡’ FIXED: Popup window not open for existing users bug fixed
â‡’ FIXED: O.nodes not iterable bug fixed
â‡’ ADDED: Embed PDF file in keep note added
â‡’  IMPROVED: Remove highlight improved

ğŸš€ Version 0.1.0
â‡’ CHANGED: Extension re-written from scratch
â‡’ CHANGED: Sidepanel note list layout changed
â‡’ CHANGED: Options page layout changed
â‡’ ADDED: Screenshot and clipped article's images auto-upload feature added
â‡’ ADDED: Allow to upload webp/avif/heic/tiff image on keep
â‡’ ADDED: Clip article and multi select text feature added
â‡’ ADDED: ChatGPT AI summary, MindMap and Highlight added
â‡’ ADDED: Now you can change new note  filename format
â‡’ ADDED: keepClipper now available in 24 languages

â„¹ï¸ Google keep trademark and it logo owned by Google Inc.

ğŸ”” Save to Google Keep in a single click! Capture screenshot. AI summary

ğŸ“¢ Top Features
âœª No Signup or permission required
âœª Open Keep notes in side Panel
âœª Save selected text, images and urls
âœª  Capture and insert screenshot
âœª Clip article and multi select text
âœª Al summary, Mindmap and Highlight powered by ChatGPT
âœª Automatically saves to Google Keep
âœª Insert text & images by drag & drop
âœª Insert text by ctrl+C 
âœª Insert text & images by right-click menu
âœª Upload webp/avif/heic/tiff image on keep
âœª  Embed PDF file in google keep note 
âœª Persistent Text Highlighter
âœª Lightweight 50KB only
âœª no tracking, no Ads
âœª Dark mode

âŒ¨ï¸ keyboard shortcuts
keyboard shortcuts 
Alt + K â‡’ Open keepClipper sidePanel
Alt + S â‡’ Capture Screenshot
Alt + M â‡’ Multi select text
Esc â‡’ Close note editor popup
Ctrl+Z â‡’ undo (work only when copy listener on)
Ctrl+Y â‡’ redo (work only when copy listener on)
Alt + H â‡’ highlight (work only when copy listener on)
Ctrl+ Shift + H â‡’ remove highlight 
Ctrl+ Shift + Z â‡’ undo highlight 
Ctrl+ Shift + Y â‡’ redo highlight 
Shift + Space â‡’ extend selection (work only when copy listener on)

â„¹ï¸  How to use keepClipper
Pin keepClipper after install extension
Click on keepClipper or (Alt + K ) to open keepClipper side Panel
Drag text & images and drop into notes

âœï¸ Append text
1. Select text and hover over *clip to keep* from right click menu then select notes
2. Open keepClipper side panel. Open note editor dialog.
selected text will auto-copied to  keepCliper when you press ctrl+c on any webpage
Ctrl+Z for undo
Ctrl+Y for redo
Shift + Space for extend selection
Alt+H for highlight text (work only when copy listener on)
3. Drag text and drop on note

âœ… Clip article in one click
If you want summarize current webpage or create mindmap then change clip content type.
 keyboard shortcut: Alt + A (works when popup window open)
Clip article from current tab or all open tabs in one click.
you can add frontmatter and download articles' images into "images" folder.

âœ… AI Summary, Mindmap and Highlight

â˜› Note:
If you want to clip text contents in markdown format, you need to enable markdown format option on extension's options page

ğŸ–¥ï¸ Take screenshot
Click on screenshot icon for capture and save screenshot.
Select note where you want to insert screenshot.
keepClipper capture selected area and upload screenshot on google keep
Use Keyboard shortcut (Alt + S)

ğŸ–ï¸ Highlight text
When you clip selected text, selected text will highlighted automatically
Click on Save Highlight button on right bottom corner to save highlight.
For remove highlight, Select again highlighted text and press Ctrl + Shift + H.
For disable highlight, Go to options page

âœ… Clip text, linkUrls and images by right click menu
Right click on selected content then hover over "clip to keep" option
Select note from sub-menu list and selected content will insert into keep

ğŸš€ Version 0.1.11
â‡’ FIXED: keep asking account not login
â‡’ FIXED: Failed to fetch all existing notes
â‡’ FIXED: Cannot capture screenshot
â‡’ FIXED: Insert screenshot in new note create list note

ğŸš€ Version 0.1.10
â‡’ FIXED: Popup window not open for existing users bug fixed
â‡’ FIXED: O.nodes not iterable bug fixed
â‡’ ADDED: Embed PDF file in keep note added
â‡’  IMPROVED: Remove highlight improved

ğŸš€ Version 0.1.0
â‡’ CHANGED: Extension re-written from scratch
â‡’ CHANGED: Sidepanel note list layout changed
â‡’ CHANGED: Options page layout changed
â‡’ ADDED: Screenshot and clipped article's images auto-upload feature added
â‡’ ADDED: Allow to upload webp/avif/heic/tiff image on keep
â‡’ ADDED: Clip article and multi select text feature added
â‡’ ADDED: ChatGPT AI summary, MindMap and Highlight added
â‡’ ADDED: Now you can change new note  filename format
â‡’ ADDED: keepClipper now available in 24 languages

â„¹ï¸ This is unofficial web clipper extension for google keep

â„¹ï¸ Google keep trademark and it logo owned by Google Inc.

Note: Version 0.1.0 has breaking changes. If extension work unexpectly, please re-install it.
long.id:
ğŸ”” Simpan ke Google Keep dengan satu klik! Ambil tangkapan layar. Ringkasan AI

ğŸ“¢ Fitur Unggulan
âœª Tidak perlu Mendaftar atau izin
âœª Buka catatan Keep di Panel samping
âœª Simpan teks, gambar, dan url yang dipilih
âœª Ambil dan sisipkan tangkapan layar
âœª Klip artikel dan pilih teks multi
âœª Ringkasan AI, Peta Pikiran, dan Sorotan didukung oleh ChatGPT
âœª Otomatis menyimpan ke Google Keep
âœª Sisipkan teks & gambar dengan drag & drop
âœª Sisipkan teks dengan ctrl+C
âœª Sisipkan teks & gambar dengan menu klik kanan
âœª Unggah gambar webp/avif/heic/tiff di keep
âœª Penyorot Teks Permanen
âœª tidak ada pelacakan, tidak ada Iklan
âœª Mode gelap

âŒ¨ï¸ pintasan keyboard
pintasan keyboard
Alt + K â‡’ Buka panel samping keepClipper
Alt + S â‡’ Ambil Tangkapan Layar
Alt + M â‡’ Pilih teks multi
Esc â‡’ Tutup editor catatan popup
Ctrl+Z â‡’ batalkan (hanya berfungsi saat pendengar salin aktif)
Ctrl+Y â‡’ ulangi (hanya berfungsi saat pendengar salin aktif)
Alt + H â‡’ sorot (hanya berfungsi saat pendengar salin aktif)
Ctrl+ Shift + H â‡’ hapus sorotan (hanya berfungsi saat pendengar salin aktif)
Shift + Spasi â‡’ perluas pilihan (hanya berfungsi saat pendengar salin aktif)

â„¹ï¸ Cara menggunakan keepClipper
Sematkan keepClipper setelah menginstal ekstensi
Klik keepClipper atau (Alt + K) untuk membuka Panel samping keepClipper
Seret teks & gambar dan jatuhkan ke dalam catatan

âœï¸ Tambahkan teks
1. Pilih teks dan arahkan kursor ke *klip untuk disimpan* dari menu klik kanan lalu pilih catatan
2. Buka panel samping keepClipper. Buka dialog editor catatan. teks yang dipilih akan disalin otomatis ke keepCliper saat Anda menekan ctrl+c di halaman web mana pun
Ctrl+Z untuk membatalkan
Ctrl+Y untuk mengulang
Shift + Spasi untuk memperluas pilihan
Alt+H untuk menyorot teks (hanya berfungsi saat pendengar salin aktif)
3. Seret teks dan letakkan di catatan

âœ… Klip artikel dalam satu klik
Jika Anda ingin meringkas halaman web saat ini atau membuat peta pikiran, ubah jenis konten klip.
pintasan keyboard: Alt + A (berfungsi saat jendela pop-up terbuka)
Klip artikel dari tab saat ini atau semua tab yang terbuka dalam satu klik.
Anda dapat menambahkan frontmatter dan mengunduh gambar artikel ke folder "images".

âœ… Ringkasan AI, Peta Pikiran, dan Sorotan

â˜› Catatan:
Jika Anda ingin klip konten teks dalam format markdown, Anda perlu mengaktifkan opsi format markdown pada halaman opsi ekstensi

ğŸ–¥ï¸ Ambil tangkapan layar
Klik ikon tangkapan layar untuk mengambil dan menyimpan tangkapan layar.
Pilih catatan tempat Anda ingin menyisipkan tangkapan layar.
keepClipper menangkap area yang dipilih dan mengunggah tangkapan layar di google keep
Gunakan pintasan Keyboard (Alt + S)

ğŸ–ï¸ Sorot teks
Saat Anda memotong teks yang dipilih, teks yang dipilih akan disorot secara otomatis
Klik tombol Simpan Sorotan di sudut kanan bawah untuk menyimpan sorotan. Untuk menghapus sorotan, Pilih lagi teks yang disorot dan tekan Ctrl + Shift + H.
Untuk menonaktifkan sorotan, Buka halaman opsi

âœ… Klip teks, linkUrl, dan gambar dengan menu klik kanan
Klik kanan pada konten yang dipilih lalu arahkan kursor ke opsi "klip untuk disimpan"
Pilih catatan dari daftar sub-menu dan konten yang dipilih akan dimasukkan ke dalam keep

ğŸš€ Versi 0.1.0
â‡’ DIUBAH: Ekstensi ditulis ulang dari awal
â‡’ DIUBAH: Tata letak daftar catatan Sidepanel diubah
â‡’ DIUBAH: Tata letak halaman opsi diubah
â‡’ DITAMBAHKAN: Fitur unggah otomatis gambar artikel yang dipotong dan tangkapan layar ditambahkan
â‡’ DITAMBAHKAN: Izinkan untuk mengunggah gambar webp/avif/heic/tiff di keep
â‡’ DITAMBAHKAN: Klip artikel dan fitur teks pilihan ganda ditambahkan
â‡’ DITAMBAHKAN: Ringkasan ChatGPT AI, MindMap, dan Sorotan ditambahkan
â‡’ DITAMBAHKAN: Sekarang Anda dapat mengubah format nama file catatan baru
â‡’ DITAMBAHKAN: keepClipper sekarang tersedia dalam 24 bahasa

â„¹ï¸ Ini adalah ekstensi web clipper tidak resmi untuk google keep

â„¹ï¸ Merek dagang dan logo Google keep dimiliki oleh Google Inc.

Catatan: Versi 0.1.0 memiliki perubahan yang merusak. Jika ekstensi berfungsi tidak terduga, silakan instal ulang.

â„¹ï¸ Come usare keepClipper
Aggiungi keepClipper dopo aver installato l'estensione
Clicca su keepClipper o (Alt + K) per aprire il pannello laterale di keepClipper
Trascina testo e immagini e rilasciali nelle note

âœï¸ Aggiungi testo
1. Seleziona il testo e passa il mouse su *ritaglia per mantenere* dal menu di scelta rapida, quindi seleziona note
2. Apri il pannello laterale di keepClipper. Apri la finestra di dialogo dell'editor delle note. il testo selezionato verrÃ  copiato automaticamente in keepCliper quando premi ctrl+c su qualsiasi pagina web
Ctrl+Z per annullare
Ctrl+Y per ripetere
Maiusc + Spazio per estendere la selezione
Alt+H per evidenziare il testo (funziona solo quando Ã¨ attivo il listener di copia)
3. Trascina il testo e rilascialo sulla nota

âœ… Ritaglia l'articolo con un clic
Se vuoi riassumere la pagina web corrente o creare una mappa mentale, cambia il tipo di contenuto del ritaglio.
Scorciatoia da tastiera: Alt + A (funziona quando Ã¨ aperta la finestra popup)
Ritaglia l'articolo dalla scheda corrente o da tutte le schede aperte con un clic.
Puoi aggiungere il frontmatter e scaricare le immagini degli articoli nella cartella "immagini".

âœ… Riepilogo AI, mappa mentale ed evidenziazione

Se vuoi ritagliare il contenuto del testo in formato markdown, devi abilitare l'opzione del formato markdown nella pagina delle opzioni dell'estensione

ğŸ–¥ï¸ Cattura screenshot
Fai clic sull'icona dello screenshot per catturare e salvare lo screenshot.
Seleziona la nota in cui vuoi inserire lo screenshot. keepClipper cattura l'area selezionata e carica lo screenshot su Google Keep
Usa la scorciatoia da tastiera (Alt + S)

ğŸ–ï¸ Evidenzia testo
Quando ritagli il testo selezionato, il testo selezionato verrÃ  evidenziato automaticamente
Clicca sul pulsante Salva evidenziazione nell'angolo in basso a destra per salvare l'evidenziazione. Per rimuovere l'evidenziazione, seleziona di nuovo il testo evidenziato e premi Ctrl + Maiusc + H.
Per disattivare l'evidenziazione, vai alla pagina delle opzioni

âœ… Ritaglia testo, linkUrl e immagini tramite il menu di scelta rapida
Fai clic con il pulsante destro del mouse sul contenuto selezionato, quindi passa il mouse sull'opzione "Ritaglia per conservare"
Seleziona la nota dall'elenco del sottomenu e il contenuto selezionato verrÃ  inserito in Keep
